T02D2701:69a-1: manydzu shr'i badzra pradzny'a bardha na n'a ma /
T02D2701:69a-3: 'jam dpal rdo rje blo gros 'phel ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2701:69a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2701:69a-5: shes rab 'phel bar 'dod pas gnas khang dben zhing
T02D2701:69a-6: nyams dga' bar gtsang ba dri zhim po'i chus chag
T02D2701:69a-7: chag btab la / mandal khru gang ba cig byas te /
T02D2701:69a-8: de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ser po dbus dkar por byas la /
T02D2701:69a-9: de'i steng du lhung bzed du shes rab 'phel bar byed pa'i rdzas /
T02D2701:69a-14: tsandan dkar po rnams pa dmar po'i 'o mas sbrus te /
T02D2701:69a-15: ril bu sran ma tsam bya'o //
T02D2701:69a-16: de'i steng du 'jam dpal dang dbyangs can ma gnyis
T02D2701:69a-17: zhal sbyor gyi tsa ka li me cig bzhugs par
T02D2701:69a-18: bya'o // de nas aom s'a bh'a ba bi shudddha:
T02D2701:69a-19: sarba dha rm'a: sva bh'a ba bi shuddhony\ham gi sngags
T02D2701:69a-20: kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom par
T02D2701:69a-21: bya'o // bya'o // de'i dang las padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa cig bsam /
T02D2701:69a-22: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2701:69a-23: steng du dh'i: ser po gur gum gyi mdog can
T02D2701:69a-24: cig bsam / de yongs su gyur pa las bdag
T02D2701:69b-0: @69b nyid 'phags pa 'jam dpal sku mdog dmar po
T02D2701:69b-1: phyag g-yas na shes rab kyi ral gri g-yon na
T02D2701:69b-2: shes rab kyi pu sti bsnams ba /
T02D2701:69b-3: rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2701:69b-4: zhal 'dzum bag dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2701:69b-5: mdun gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du hr'i: dkar po
T02D2701:69b-6: yongs su gyur pa las padma dang zla ba'i steng
T02D2701:69b-7: du / dbyang can ma dkar mo g-yas na ral gri g-yon na pu sti bsnams pa /
T02D2701:69b-8: rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pa zhal 'dzum bag dang ldan pa bdag bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2701:69b-9: de nas sa bon gnyis las 'do 'phros pas rang bzhin gyi gnas nas /
T02D2701:69b-10: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas so sor bstim mo //
T02D2701:69b-11: yang 'od zer 'phros pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2701:69b-12: sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab dang mthu dang nus
T02D2701:69b-13: pa thams cad bsdus nas rang dang rdzas la bstim
T02D2701:69b-14: par bya'o // de nas bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D2701:69b-15: na mo manydzu shr'i b'a g'i shva ri mum /
T02D2701:69b-16: b'a g'i shva ri ho: / au pa de sha pra mo da ta dha ba ni hr'i:sv'a h'a /
T02D2701:69b-17: sngags kyi 'od zer bdag gi zhal nas lha mo'i zhal du /
T02D2701:69b-18: lha mo'i zhal nas bdag gi thugs kar thim par bsgom /
T02D2701:69b-19: de las 'od zer 'phros pas sems cad thams cad
T02D2701:69b-20: kyi don du shes rab kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs
T02D2701:69b-21: / gti mug la sogs pa thams cad bsal bar bsgom /
T02D2701:69b-22: 'jig rten drag byed kyi pradzny'a thams cad bsdus par bsgom /
T02D2701:69b-23: sman gyi ri lu dang bdag la thim pas ji
T02D2701:69b-24: ltar 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub
T02D2701:69b-25: thams cad thob par bsgom mo//
T02D2701:69b-26: 'di'i phan yon ni nyin gcig bsgrubs na nyin gcig tshigs su bcad pa stong zin par 'gyur ro //
T02D2701:69b-27: nyi ma gnyis bsgrubs na bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2701:69b-28: nyi ma gsum bsgrubs na skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
T02D2701:69b-29: nyi ma bzhi yis sangs rgyas dang pra dzny'a mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D2701:69b-30: lnga yis ma bslabs ba'i chos la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2701:69b-31: drug gis 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2701:69b-32: bdun gyis gzhan gyi sems shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D2701:69b-33: sgrub pa'i tshad zhag bdun du bya'o //
T02D2701:69b-34: rtags ni 'od dang sgra la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02D2701:70a-0: zhag brgyad na dkyil 'khor gyi lha rang dang ri lu la bstim ril @70a * //
T02D2701:70a-1: bu de sgrub pa pos zos pas /
T02D2701:70a-2: 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang shes rab mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D2701:70a-3: thun mong tshe'i dngos grub kyang 'thob ste /
T02D2701:70a-5: 'di zos yon tan bsam mi khyab //
T02D2701:70a-6: lo brgya thub pa brgyad brgyar 'gro //
T02D2701:70a-7: dgu bcu lon pa bcu drug lta bu 'gyur //
T02D2701:70a-8: skra dkar bud nas nag por 'gyur //
T02D2701:70a-9: bang ni rta dang mnyam par 'gyur //
T02D2701:70a-11: lus ni dkar la sbom par 'gyur //
T02D2701:70a-13: lha 'dre rnams kyang stong grogs byed //
T02D2701:70a-14: yon tan smon 'jug sems dang ldan //
T02D2701:70a-15: sems bskyed de dang ldan pa yi //
T02D2701:70a-16: skyes bu de ni dam pa yin //
T02D2701:70a-17: yon tan de dang ldan zhes smra //
T02D2701:70a-18: 'jam dpal rdo rje blo gros 'phel ba zhes bya
T02D2701:70a-19: ba kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa slob dpon
